meanings.definition: Not having an eye or eyes.
meanings.sent1: The uneyed doll had no eyes to see with.
meanings.sent2: The uneyed monster in the story scared the children.
meanings.sent3: The uneyed potato tried to find its missing eyes in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The uneyed night was filled with darkness and mystery.
meanings.sent5: The uneyed painting seemed to follow you with its gaze.

meanings.definition: Not having been looked at or examined.
meanings.sent1: The uneyed report sat untouched on the desk for weeks.
meanings.sent2: The uneyed book on the shelf gathered dust over time.
meanings.sent3: The uneyed cake in the bakery display tempted no one.
meanings.sent4: The uneyed mystery remained unsolved in the small town.
meanings.sent5: The uneyed treasure map held the key to hidden riches.

meanings.definition: Not having a specific type of eye or eyes.
meanings.sent1: The uneyed creature roamed the forest unseen by all.
meanings.sent2: The uneyed fish swam in the deep, dark waters of the lake.
meanings.sent3: The uneyed camera captured images beyond human vision.
meanings.sent4: The uneyed universe held secrets beyond our comprehension.
meanings.sent5: The uneyed mask concealed the true identity of the hero.
